about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure of strategic brilliance and heart-pounding excitement in Asmodeus! Build your village from scratch, transforming it into a fortified stronghold against relentless monstrous invaders. Defense alone won't suffice - venture beyond your village boundaries to uncover the secrets behind the relentless attacks. Traverse perilous landscapes, battle formidable adversaries, and discover the dark force driving the onslaught. Will you become a beacon of resilience or fall to the encroaching darkness?

In a world much like our own, humanity's overpopulation led the gods to unleash a plague to cull humanity’s numbers. There were those who aimed to save humanity, but now they are long since dead or cast from the Heavens. You remain, left in this purgatory to navigate the cosmic struggle between the strict order of the heavens, and the embrace of suffering from the Hells. Build, defend, explore, and discover the truth - your destiny in Asmodeus awaits!

Features


Stunning 2.5D Pixel World - Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted pixel world that blends nostalgic charm with modern visual finesse.

Village Life - True to a tower defense narrative, collect and manage resources to establish and build your village. Rescue, spawn, and incorporate the support of golems to further the progress of your village. As you become more established, upgrade different buildings to secure better rewards and defenses to aid against the threats outside your walls.



Withstand the Hordes – The end of one wave of monsters, only too soon becomes the beginning of the next. Defend your village against the ravaging of these monstrous invaders. Each battle tests your strategic prowess and resilience, but only deepens the question of where are these beasts all coming from?



Quest and World Development - Venture out into the realm to uncover mysteries. With each quest completed revealing new aspects of the world and a means to understanding the unrelenting hordes. Beware, every area encountered and uncovered leads to a unique boss encounter.

Upgrading Character - Collect new gear and upgrades as you forge across dangerous landscapes. Customize and strengthen your character to meet the growing challenges.
